LanguageData.RT_Type85III_Vehicle.label: Type85-III
LanguageData.RT_Type85III_Vehicle.description:
A 2nd generation MBT designed for foreign trade, equipped with an 120mm cannon with auto-loader and 7.62x54mmR machine gun, also with grenade launchers, applied composite armor and ERA for improved defensibility.

<color=#bb8f04>Crew:</color> Driver x1, Gunner x1，Commander x1
<color=#bb8f04>Fuel:</color> Chemfuel

<color=#b0e0e6>CE Ammo:</color> 
120mm（Main Cannon）
.50BMG（Support MG）
7.62x54mmR（Coaxial MG）
